/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with buildings on both sides, their facades painted in a variety of colors, adding a vibrant touch to the urban landscape. Cars are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. The sky above is hazy, casting a soft light over the scene. In the distance, a tall tower stands out, its height dwarfing the surrounding buildings and adding a unique architectural element to the cityscape.
